title: How to share my phone screen with my tablet - Quora

response.answer_text: You can use an Android/iPhone app Screen Mirror - Screen Sharing. This app will mirror your phone screen to the tablet. Some basic steps are in the following list. You can see this clip on Youtube to know how to use that app. Install Screen Mirror - Screen Sharing app on smartphone from App Store or Google Play.On the tablet, access web page screenmirrorapp.com.Press Start Scan in Screen Mirror app in smartphone. Scan QR code on tablet screen.
